content: the men s maxwell sweater crochet pattern is a lightweight v-neck sweater that is worked in two panels sewn together with sleeves and trim added at the end this men s crochet sweater is both stylish and dapper and great for every occasion **what s included with your purchase ** * 13 page printable pdf * written instructions for men s sizes small through 5x * photos for visual aid throughout the pattern * links to video stitch and sewing tutorials **pattern difficulty ** intermediate/advanced **construction of garment ** sweater is worked in two rectangular panels that are laid on top of each other vertically and sewn together along the side and shoulders sleeves and trim are then added by joining to the garment ****see **sizing chart with yardage**** here 2 ** **yarn ** ** wecrochet stroll fingering 3 ** all of my patterns are thoroughly tested by experienced pattern testers and fellow designers to ensure you get a pattern that is easy to read and follow all of my patterns are in american terms due to the nature of the pdf files sales i will not refund any patterns once they have been downloaded however i am always available via email or a message here on ravelry if you have any questions about the patterns ** new to crocheting garments for men check out my the free ultimate guide to crocheting garments for men 4 ** you may sell what you produce from my patterns but the pattern itself is copyrighted and may not be shared or changed in part or in whole my photos are also copyrighted and may never be used to sell the products you make *this listing contains affiliate links * 1 https //www subscribepage com/menscrochetpatterns 2 https //docs google com/document/d/1u8ludvpxfxiy0wsowgxhbw9vkwld1rezlkgs8kxvk3y/edit usp=sharing 3 https //shareasale com/r cfm b=1435419&u=1361772&m=59159&urllink=&afftrack= 4 https //www subscribepage com/menscrochetpatterns
